headline: Gov. DeWine makes 1st statewide address in 3 years
author: Associated Press
sentences: Mike DeWine used his first State of the State speech in three years on Wednesday to boast about Ohio’s recovery from the coronavirus pandemic and its economic health while also pledging new investments in Appalachia and calling for more efforts to address mental illness treatment.
Even with the governor in the midst of a reelection campaign this year, he didn’t propose any major initiatives during the hourlon ...
